text: Adak na gata yoh Yaâ€˜qob wapheut Geukheun bak aneuk wasiet geupeugah Soe nyang taseumah â€˜Oh leupah lonjak Jaweub meusigak aneuk meutuah Kheun aneuk teuma bandum na kamoe Tuhanku sidroe nyang kamoe seumah Tuhan Po gata ngon indatu gata Ibrahim bapa Ismail ayah Ishak teuma ayah droe gata Bandum seurupa hana meuubah Kamoe pih keunan bandum meujok droe Bak Tuhan sidroe kamoe meunyerah
